summary: A New York attorney is sent to Shanghai on business, where he finds himself in a legal mess that threatens his career. With the help of a relocation specialist and her contacts, he soon learns to appreciate the wonders of Shanghai.
cast: Le Geng|Daniel Henney|Sean Gallagher|Bill Marcus|John Paul Lopez|Eliza Coupe|Bill Paxton|Ying Tang|Yong Wang|Zhu Zhu|Alan Ruck|Lu Cai|Long Shen Dao|Yanyan Wu|Arran Hawkins|Siyuan Lu|Kara Wang|Gillian Renee Rexach|Eva Jin|Meng Yu|Yiru Zhang|Qian Zuo Guo|Jingwu Gao|Jesse Huang|Charles Mayer|Nathan 'Flutebox' Lee|Frank Zhu|Jim Bennett|Christopher Liger|Zixuan Yang|Yun Wang|James Rice|Shane P. Zhang|Shimao Zhu|Zheng Qian|Christine Francois
title: Shanghai Calling
